abstract: Christian Dior said it had dropped the actress Sharon Stone from its advertising in China after she suggested that the earthquakes in Sichuan Province were karmic retribution for the country’s treatment of Tibet.
snippet: Christian Dior said it had dropped the actress Sharon Stone from its advertising in China after she suggested that the earthquakes in Sichuan Province were karmic retribution for the country’s treatment of Tibet.
lead_paragraph: PARIS  Christian Dior, the French fashion brand, has become the latest global company to learn a hard lesson about the danger of offending Chinese pride.

headline.main: Dior Drops Actress From Ads After China Remarks
